title: Mary Kay Foundation Primer Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 1 fluid ounce
description: This lightweight gel glides on easily to fill in imperfections and dries quickly to a matte finish to create the perfect canvas for a flawless foundation application that enhances foundation benefits and extends wear.Foundation primers have been a secret of professional makeup artists for years to give models and celebrities flawless looking skin. Mary Kay Foundation Primer SPF 15* perfects skin as it enhances foundation benefits and extends foundation wear. In fact, some women who tried the product believed that Mary Kay Foundation Primer helped foundation maintain an acceptable appearance for nine hours or more.

title: Best Vitamin C Serum For Face with 18% Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid + MSM ★ 98% Natural & 72% Organic Ingredients ★ Potent Facial Serum ★ J&K Topical Vitamin C Anti Aging Serum is Packed With Antioxidants To Help Minimize The Appearance of Wrinkles Around Eyes, Face & Neck ★ 1 oz ★ 365-Day Money Back Guarantee
description: What Makes Joy & Karma's Vitamin C Serum Safe?Made with 98% natural and 72% organic ingredients, our serum has none of the bad stuff like sulphates, parabens, alcohol, petrochemicals and artificial colors. Will J&K; Products Work For Me?Can we really expect a $25 dollar product to turn back time and "drop 10 years off your face" as our competitors claim? If only it were that simple!So when our customers rave about the GREAT results they're getting from using our serums, your individual results will undoubtedly vary. We really want to but we can't promise the moon. How Does Your 365-Day Money Back Guarantee Work?We want YOU to experience JOY when you buy from us and that's why we promise to refund every penny within the first 365 days if you're not 100% satisfied. *Email us directly and you don't even have to return the bottle! Is It True Joy &  Karma Donates 10% of Profits to Charities?Yes! HAPPY Customers (=JOY) and GIVING Back (=KARMA) will ALWAYS be our top priorities. What's the Difference Between J&K's Vitamin C Serum and Hyaluronic Acid Serum?Our vitamin C serum's 18% vitamin C concentration can help your skin produce more collagen thereby reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Our hyaluronic acid serum on the other hand acts more like a moisturizer due to its higher hyaluronic acid concentration and makes for softer, silkier skin.Many of our customers own both of our serums and we recommend you try both to see which works better. ***Ready To Buy? Then click the "ADD TO CART" button now!
